channel.title: vSphere7 on IT Gaiden
channel.description: Recent content in vSphere7 on IT Gaiden

item.title: vCenter Server 7.0 – Fresh install
item.description: Prologue With the release of vSphere 7 at the beginning of this month, I decided to make a post about how to install vCenter Server Appliance (vCSA) which is quite simple.Which are the new features? Check this postfrom my friend Graham Barker to find out! Let’s move on!Prerequisite:We need DNSif we want to deploy vCenter with an FQDN but if you don’t have it or you can’t for any reason, you can trick the installer and put the IP address as the hostname and it will work.
